{"scene_number": 1, "timestamp": "00:00 - 00:13", "location": "Park at night", "visual_description": "A person is walking a dog in a park at night. The lighting is dim, with streetlights and some ambient light from buildings. The person is wearing casual clothes and the dog is on a leash. The trees are visible in the background.", "characters": ["Unidentified person", "Dog"], "dialogue": "אה, אה, אה, אה,", "mood_tone": "Quiet, everyday activity"},
{"scene_number": 2, "timestamp": "00:13 - 00:32", "location": "Living room", "visual_description": "A man is sitting on a couch in a living room, reading a magazine. He is wearing a white t-shirt and shorts. The room is furnished with a couch, a coffee table, and a lamp. There is a bowl of fruit on the coffee table. The lighting is warm and domestic.", "characters": ["Man 1"], "dialogue": "כן. היי, עצקו, מה קורה אחי? ככה הרבה זמן לחזורה. כן, סורי, אולי, עם דברים על הראש. מה, על מרצי תלדבר? מה, אתה עם הכלבה עכשיו? כן, אני מרדן, הטיול על לי, את יודעת. על מרצי תלדבר? עצקו?", "mood_tone": "Casual, conversational"},
{"scene_number": 3, "timestamp": "00:32 - 00:41", "location": "Living room", "visual_description": "The same man from the previous scene is now on the phone, still sitting on the couch. He is holding a book or magazine and appears to be listening intently. The setting remains the same living room.", "characters": ["Man 1"], "dialogue": "יצקו התנתקנו, דבר איתי, ביי. אתה היה זהו, לא מדברת אותו. למה, מה קרה? נשבר לי, אחי, כל פשוט נתקשר להם, אומרים, נחזור לך בלילה. למה? למה, כן, טוב, לא רק שום את האלה מהכלבה שלו, בלילה. אתה קולט, אני חבר כלבה. אתה מה?", "mood_tone": "Concerned, frustrated"},
{"scene_number": 4, "timestamp": "00:41 - 01:05", "location": "Living room", "visual_description": "The man is still on the phone, his expression is one of disbelief and frustration. He is gesturing with his free hand. The background remains the same living room.", "characters": ["Man 1"], "dialogue": "על מה אתה מדבר? הרבה יותר מש
